DataElement.preferredName: Patient Previous Administration Raf Kinase Inhibitor MEK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor ERK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether the patient had previous treatment with a RAF inhibitor, a MEK inhibitor, or an ERK inhibitor.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Previous Administration Raf Kinase Inhibitor MEK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor ERK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Occurring prior to something else._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Any substance that inhibits Raf Kinase, an enzyme active in signal transduction in the Ras pathway. Inhibition of Raf kinase may result in reduced cell proliferation and cell death._A change in the nucleotide sequence in a MEK family gene._A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target._A change in the nucleotide sequence in a ERK family gene._A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Previous Administration Raf Kinase Inhibitor MEK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor ERK Family Gene Mutation Inhibitor Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:Any substance that inhibits Raf Kinase, an enzyme active in signal transduction in the Ras pathway. Inhibition of Raf kinase may result in reduced cell proliferation and cell death.:A change in the nucleotide sequence in a MEK family gene.:A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.:A change in the nucleotide sequence in a ERK family gene.:A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Any substance that inhibits Raf Kinase, an enzyme active in signal transduction in the Ras pathway. Inhibition of Raf kinase may result in reduced cell proliferation and cell death.
A change in the nucleotide sequence in a MEK family gene.
A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.
A change in the nucleotide sequence in a ERK family gene.
A class of substances that binds to and inhibits the function or activity of a target.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient had previous
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had previous treatment with a RAF inhibitor, a MEK inhibitor, or an ERK inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had previous treatment with dabrafenib (or another RAF inhibitor), trametinib (or another MEK inhibitor), or an ERK inhibitor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had prior treatment with a pan-RAF inhibitor?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
